content.text: Match ends, Santos 0, Barcelona 4.
Second Half ends, Santos 0, Barcelona 4.
Attempt missed. Dani Alves (Barcelona) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is just a bit too high. Assisted by Pedro.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pedro.
Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Henrique (Santos).
Dani Alves (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Henrique (Santos).
Attempt missed. Alan Kardec (Santos) header from a difficult angle on the left is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Neymar with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Santos. Conceded by Andreu Fontàs.
Substitution, Barcelona. Andreu Fontàs replaces Carles Puyol.
Elano (Santos) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).
Substitution, Santos. Ibson replaces Ganso.
Goal!  Santos 0, Barcelona 4. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dani Alves following a fast break.
Dani Alves (Barcelona) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Pedro.
Substitution, Barcelona. Pedro replaces Thiago Alcántara.
Substitution, Santos. Alan Kardec replaces Borges.
Attempt blocked. Dani Alves (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Edu Dracena (Santos) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Substitution, Barcelona. Javier Mascherano replaces Gerard Piqué.

Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Rafael Cabral.
